text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump In the middle of the COVID-19 crisis  @realDonaldTrump is taking retribution by firing his intelligence Inspector General for doing the job. It's all about Trump and everyone else can just drop dead.
